title: Book Online at Whole Body Healing, Acupuncture and Wellness
description: Whole Body Healing Acupuncture and Wellness Online booking site
cleaned_text: We've Move! We are now located at 243 King St. Suite 247, Northampton, MA. 01060. Our suite is located on the second floor on the left side of the building. Please call us if you have questions or problems 413-345-0800. Elizabeth received her Doctorate in Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine from Pacific College of Health and Science, San Diego. She received a bachelor's degree in Psychology from the University of Massachusetts. She is a licensed Acupuncturist and Herbalist in the state of Massachusetts as well as board certified by the National Certification Commission for Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine. She specializes in pain and stress management. She also works with women's health issues such as fertility and peri-menopause symptoms. Elizabeth received her Doctorate in Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine from Pacific College of Heal... Read More Tim Kroll MS, L.Ac. Tim Kroll, MS, L.Ac. received his master's degree in Acupuncture and Chinese medicine from one of the top schools in the country, American College of Traditional Chinese Medicine located in San Francisco. There he gained experience working with pain conditions using techniques such as acupuncture, tui na and cupping. He also enjoys working with more internal, chronic conditions and focusing on the "whole health" of a patient. Tim is knowledgeable in Chinese herbs and nutritional supplements.
